summary.span: 表示這個 的 物件集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of objects for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件可讓相關的父/子系之間的巡覽物件。A object enables navigation between related parent/child objects. 您建立藉由定義為屬性的物件或，而不是直接使用建構函式。You create a object by defining it as a property of either the or the , instead of by directly using a constructor. (使用的屬性，或有屬性。)(Use the property of the , or the property of the .) 若要存取的集合，使用屬性物件。To access the collection, use the property of the object. 只要集合仍存在，您就可以管理其包含這類使用方法的物件， ，和。As soon as the collection exists you can manage the objects it contains by using methods such as , , and .

threadsafe.span: 此類型是安全多執行緒的讀取作業。

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 您必須同步處理任何寫入作業。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已呼叫`AddRange`未將任何物件加入至集合，直到呼叫。If has been called, `AddRange` does not add any objects to the collection until is called. 當時所`EndInit`是呼叫，集合會填入最新的呼叫中指定的項目`AddRange`。At the time that `EndInit` is called, the collection will be populated with the items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange`. 如果`AddRange`多次呼叫內`BeginInit` / `EndInit`排序時，只有最新的呼叫中指定這些項目`AddRange`加入。If `AddRange` is called multiple times within a `BeginInit` / `EndInit` sequence, only those items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange` are added. ## Examples [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRelationCollection.AddRange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRelationCollection.AddRange Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRelationCollection.AddRange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRelationCollection.AddRange Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 從集合移除指定的關聯。

span.span: Removes the specified relation from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果移除作業成功，會引發事件。The event is fired if the remove operation succeeds. 請注意，移除此關聯性時，不會移除任何相關聯的條件約束的物件。Note that removing the relation does not remove any associated constraint objects.

exception.span: 關聯為 null 值。

span.span: The relation is a null value.

exception.span: 關聯不屬於集合。

span.span: The relation does not belong to the collection.
